tip_waiter: Would you like to tip your waiter?
can_we_assist: How can we assist you today? Please select an option below.
order_your_food: Order your favourite food or drink.
your_food_description: Craving something delicious? Enjoy the flavors you love, delivered with just a few taps. Stress-free dining, every time. Orderly
explore_menu_description: Discover a world of flavors, crafted with care and passion. Our chefs select only the finest ingredients to bring you a delightful culinary experience. Whether you're craving something savory or sweet, our menu has something to satisfy every appetite.
order_placed: Your order has been placed successfully.
order_placed_description_first: We are preparing your delicious meal, and it will be served at your table shortly.
order_placed_description_2: If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to let us know.
special_instructions_placeholder: Any special requests or dietary requirements for the entire order?
remove_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this item from your cart?
clear_cart_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove all items from your cart?
choose_extra_time: Choose how much extra time you need to complete your order
complete_payment: Complete your payment - thank you for dining with us!
cart_preserved: üí° Your cart items will be preserved during payment
extend_session_prompt: Choose how long you'd like to extend your session

session.expired_message: Your session has expired. Please refresh the page to continue ordering.

cart.empty_cart_description: It looks like you haven't added any items to your cart yet. Explore our menu and discover delicious options!
cart.loading_description: Please wait while we load product information
cart.special_instructions_placeholder: Any special requests or dietary requirements for the entire order?
cart.remove_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this item from your cart?
cart.clear_cart_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove all items from your cart?
cart.session_expired_warning: Cannot add items - session expired. Please refresh the page.
cart.bill_requested_warning: Cannot add new items or modify cart. Please cancel the bill request first.
cart.cannot_modify_cart_bill: Cannot modify cart - bill has been requested
cart.cannot_modify_cart_session: Cannot modify cart - session has expired

my_orders.no_orders_description: You don't have any unpaid orders. All your orders have been paid or you haven't placed any orders yet.
my_orders.add_tip: Add a Tip for Excellent Service
my_orders.pay_online: Pay securely online with your card
my_orders.pay_at_table: Pay at your table with cash or card terminal
my_orders.clear_confirmation: Are you sure you want to remove all unpaid orders?
my_orders.waiter_notified: Waiter notified {{time}}. They'll come to your table shortly.
my_orders.split_bill_description: Select items to pay for. You can also split quantities if sharing.
my_orders.split_payment_success: Your part of the bill has been paid!
my_orders.split_payment_pending: Waiting for other guests to pay their share
my_orders.paid_items_description: Items that have been paid for
my_orders.select_items_to_pay: Select items you want to pay for
my_orders.nothing_to_pay: You have nothing to pay at the moment.
my_orders.split_bill_marketing_title: Split with Friends, Pay Only What You Ate!
my_orders.split_bill_marketing_text: Divide the bill easily with friends. Each person pays only for what they consumed. Fast, fair, and fun!
my_orders.split_bill_cash_only: Split bill is only available for card payment

repeat_order.title: Order Again
repeat_order.subtitle: Quick reorder from unpaid orders
repeat_order.session_expired_warning: Cannot add items - session expired. Please refresh the page.
repeat_order.bill_requested_warning: Cannot add new items. Please cancel the bill request first if you want to order again.
repeat_order.cannot_modify_quantities_bill: Cannot modify quantities - bill has been requested
repeat_order.cannot_modify_quantities_session: Cannot modify quantities - session has expired

waiter_modal.how_can_we_assist: How can we assist you today? Please select an option below.
waiter_modal.how_would_you_like_to_pay: How would you like to pay?
waiter_modal.why_need_waiter: Why do you need a waiter?

welcome.welcome_description: Discover an unforgettable culinary journey where tradition meets innovation. Our chefs craft each dish with passion and the finest ingredients.
welcome.select_preferred_contact: Select your preferred way to contact us

not_found.error_message: Sorry, the page you're looking for doesn't exist.

thank_you.order_preparing: Your order is being prepared and will be ready soon.
thank_you.order_details_sent: Order details have been sent to your email

verify.cart_preserved_description: All items are still in your cart. You can try again or modify your order.

extension_already_in_progress: An extension is already in progress on another device
extension_in_progress_on_other_device: Session extension in progress on another device
user_not_active: Your session is no longer active. Please log in again.

order_completed.title: Order Successfully Placed!
order_completed.subtitle: Your order has been processed and will be ready soon.
order_completed.thank_you_message: We appreciate your trust. For any questions, please contact us.
order_completed.not_found_message: We couldn't find the order details. Please try again.
